text: Siri is a Scandinavian girl's name. It is a short form of Sigrid and has been widely used since the mediaeval age. It is derived from Old Norse sigr, which means victory, and fr√≠dr, which means beautiful.http://www.norskenavn.no/navn.php?id=157 This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == PEOPLE == * Siri von Essen, Finland Swedish actress married to August Strindberg ==References== Category:Given names
title: Siri (given name)
